scripts.dev:docEngine: concurrently "yarn dev" " cd node_modules/obojobo-document-engine && yarn dev"
scripts.lint: for d in ./packages/*/ ; do (cd "$d" && echo ================== && basename "$d" && yarn lint); done
scripts.lint:css: for d in ./packages/*/ ; do (cd "$d" && echo ================== && basename "$d" && yarn lint:css); done
scripts.lint:js: for d in ./packages/*/ ; do (cd "$d" && echo ================== && basename "$d" && yarn lint:js); done
scripts.open:coverage: for d in ./packages/*/ ; do (cd "$d" && echo ================== && basename "$d" && open ./coverage/lcov-report/index.html); done
scripts.precommit: for d in ./packages/*/ ; do (cd "$d" && echo ================== && basename "$d" && yarn precommit); done
scripts.setup: yarn build:docEngine && cd packages/obojobo-express && yarn db:rebuild
scripts.test: for d in ./packages/*/ ; do (cd "$d" && echo ================== && basename "$d" && yarn test); done
scripts.test:coverage: for d in ./packages/*/ ; do (cd "$d" && echo ================== && basename "$d" && yarn test -u --coverage); done
